content.raw:
Team Kanaloa, we’re running some quick tests as a sanity check and I noticed that your team Docker image exits right away after executing `docker run ...` . I’m testing with the stationkeeping task.

```
caguero@frost:~/vrx-docker$ docker ps -a
CONTAINER ID        IMAGE                              COMMAND                  CREATED             STATUS                      PORTS               NAMES
77d3197c4ff1        808brick/vrx_phase2                "fixuid /bin/bash"       23 seconds ago      Exited (0) 21 seconds ago                       vrx-competitor-system
3bbfefa02108        vrx-server-melodic-nvidia:latest   "/vrx_entrypoint.sh …"   32 seconds ago      Up 30 seconds               11345/tcp           vrx-server-system
```

Is your image supposed to automatically execute your entry point? [This](#!/osrf/vrx-docker/src/45323a4bbf7fe63d6a087fac44d710672f5ea771/run_trial.bash#lines-160) is exactly how we’re running the teams’s code.
